args.content:
import Mathlib

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. The function f tends to âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere at z0
    iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever 0 < |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_at_top_iff (z0 : â„‚) (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => |f z|) (nhdsWithin z0 (univ \ {z0})) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, z â‰  z0 â†’ |z - z0| < Î´ â†’ M < |f z| := by sorry

import Mathlib

/-- Suppose z0 âˆˆ â„‚. The function f tends to âˆž in the sense of the Riemann sphere at z0
    iff for every M > 0 there exists Î´ > 0 such that |f(z)| > M whenever 0 < |z - z0| < Î´. -/
theorem tendsto_riemann_sphere_at_top_iff (z0 : â„‚) (f : â„‚ â†’ â„‚) :
  Tendsto (fun z => |f z|) (nhdsWithin z0 (univ \ {z0})) atTop â†”
    âˆ€ M : â„, M > 0 â†’ âˆƒ Î´ > 0, âˆ€ z : â„‚, z â‰  z0 â†’ |z - z0| < Î´ â†’ M < |f z| := by sorry
